body.name: CeraVe 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash for Oily Skin - Acne Treatment, Blackhead Remover, Fragrance Free, 8 Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE pickup February 25 - 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [ACNE FACE WASH WITH SALICYLIC ACID] Salicylic acid is a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) that helps gently exfoliate and remove dead skin cells, reduce blackheads & the appearance of pores, treats & prevents acne. BHA exfoliants are less harsh than face scrubs

[FOAMING FACIAL CLEANSER] This CeraVe face wash dispenses as a clear gel and transforms into a light, foaming face wash as you lather. The gentle wash and exfoliation smooths and cleanses skin without leaving skin feeling stripped of moisture

[ACNE WASH WITH OIL ABSORBING TECHNOLOGY] CeraVe Acne Control Cleanser helps prevent new breakouts from forming with purifying clay to help absorb excess oil and niacinamide to help calm skin. Fragrance free, paraben free, & non-comedogenic

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products, formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II)to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin; sensitive skin; oily skin; acne-prone; and more. FSA Eligible & HSA Eligible
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, a gel-to-foam cleanser with 2% salicylic acid and purifying clay to remove dirt & excess oil, clean pores, gently exfoliate, and deeply reduce oiliness while helping to not disrupt the protective skin barrier or cause dryness and discomfort with 3 essential ceramides. Featuring Oil-Absorbing Technology to minimize visible shine. Formulated to clear acne, reduce blackheads, and improve the appearance of pores.•Non-Comedogenic•Paraben-free•Fragrance-free•Allergy testedKey Ingredients:•2% Salicylic acid: Treats acne and penetrates pores to help prevent new breakouts•Hectorite clay: Helps absorb oil and helps skin look less shiny•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #191 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #12 in Facial Cleansing Washes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Features and Benefits Gel to Foam Salicylic Acid Cleanser Dispenses as a clear gel and transforms into a light, foaming face wash as you lather. Effectively removes dirt and excess oil, gently exfoliates and penetrates clogged pores to help prevent new acne breakouts. How to Use Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage dime-size amount of Acne Control Cleanser into skin in a gentle circular motion. Rinse. If going outside, apply sunscreen after using this product. If irritation or sensitivity develops, stop use of both products or ask a doctor Suitable for Acne Prone Skin All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. Acne Control Cleanser is formulated without fragrance & parabens and is non-comedogenic & allergy-tested. It is suitable for acne prone skin types. 2% Salicylic Acid, Hectorite Clay , Niacinamide, and Ceramides 2% Salicylic acid treats acne, reduces blackheads, improves the appearance of pores, and penetrates pores to help prevent new breakouts. Hectorite clay helps absorb oil & helps skin look less shiny. Niacinamide helps calm the skin. Ceramides are naturally found in your skin and play a vital role in helping your skin protect you. They help fill in the gaps between your skin cells so your skin can seal in moisture and seal out impurities.

Hydrating Facial Cleanser Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Cleanser Foaming Facial Cleanser Acne Control Cleanser Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser 4% BPO Acne Foaming Cream Wash BPO 10% Skin Type Normal to Very Dry Skin Normal to Dry Skin Normal to Oily Skin Acne-prone Skin Acne-prone Skin Acne-prone Skin Key Ingredient Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Niacinamide Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Amino Acids Complex, Hyaluronic Acid Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide Salicylic Acid; Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II; Hectorite Clay, Niacinamide 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide 10% Benzoyl Peroxide, Ceramides 1, 3, 6-II, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide​ Benefits Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier Cleanses, hydrates, and removes makeup without disrupting the skin's protective barrier Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier Cleanses to unclog pores, reduces blackheads and helps prevent new breakouts Cleanses, treats active breakouts, and maintains the skin's barrier. Cleanses, treats active breakouts, and maintains the skin's barrier.

CeraVe Acne Control Cleanser CeraVe Acne Control Gel CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion with SPF 30 CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion Use For: Facial Cleanser Acne Treatment Oil Free Face Moisturizer; Daily Sunscreen Oil Free Face Moisturizer Recommended Use: AM & PM PM AM PM Key Benefits Cleanses to unclog pores, reduces blackheads and helps prevent new breakouts Clears acne, helps prevent new breakouts, minimizes pores and improves skin texture Moisturizes throughout the day. Helps restore the skin's protective barrier. Provides broad spectrum SPF 30 protection. Moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing fragrance-free non-comedogenic SA cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I have combination skin and so far this cleanser has been working great. I've only been using it for a few weeks, but looks like I have less blackheads on my face. I like the ingredients and the fact it's fragrance free, but my skin still feels a little dry afterwards. Overall I think it's a great cleanser and would recommend it to anyone who is suffering from blackheads and needs a cleanser that is fragrance free and non-comedogenic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not exfoliate. Does work though.
reviews.reviewText: This product will make you produce dead skin since it triggers your skin to cycle through creating new cells. You will need to purposefully exfoliate daily if you use this. I recommend checking with a dermatologist for the right combo of products as this is a professional grade skincare system and deserves to be treated as such.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: My teenager sporadically breaks out but he raves about this product. He says it makes his skin feel soft instead of dry and flaky. I have noticed a big difference in other products he have used compared to using this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product is good. Tho I don't know if it is working on my skin or not but I feel my skin is clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Starting using and now I can’t stop…, really love it…. Cleans face with drying. Perfect buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great face wash
reviews.reviewText: Absorbs excess sebum without stripping the moisture in theskin barrier. Great face wash. Especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love ceraVe products I use it for my face for beakouts and it has done wonders. cleared my face completely I got the cleanser, the am and pm face moisturizers. Thanks ceraVe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s sooo good for oily skin
Es muy ligero, nada agresivo con la piel.
Chegou devidamente embaladoTudo certoEu já uso CeraVe há muito tempo e diversos produtos dessa marcaPra mim funciona

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got double the amount of spots after using 3 times!! So expensive for more spots. Avoid

reviews.reviewTitle: Really good cleanser for acne and oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I use this twice a day, followed up with moisturizer.Texture-Love the lathery, soapy texture, feels like face is actually getting cleansed when compared to something like CetaphilResults -have used this for a few weeks now and it has helped in slight fading of acne and has definitely reduced new breakouts. overall skin feels less oily. did not cause any kind of irritation.ceramides added to it help in moisturizing.would definitely recommend to anyone with acne prone skin.only con is the price
Bought for my 12 year old son.
